text: Ni twalinyakwile litumbi pachanya pao pakutaŵana nao chilanga (chaakuya Taurat). Ni twasalile kuti: “Jinjililani pannango (wa chilambo cha Shami) chiinamile.” Nambo soni twasalile kuti: “Ngasinsumbaga mpika pa (kasa uchimbichimbi wa lisiku) Lyakuŵeluka.” Ni twajigele kutyochela kukwao chilanga chakulimbangana
